p: As for cytotoxic activity, one study found that C. articulatus essential oil was moderately cytotoxic to monkey kidney cells [ 32]. However, with C. articulatus essential oil, a noncytotoxic result was obtained for human pulmonary fibroblasts by cell viability assay with MTT (LC 50 > 100 μg/mL) [ 32]. It was also observed that the IC 50 of W2 and 3D7 strains of P. falciparum treated with essential oil were 1.21 μg/mL and 2.30 μg/mL, respectively [ 33], consistent with the findings in this study.
